Ditch the hassle of booking a doctor\'s appointment on phone. Switch to Jeevom\'s health mart for booking online appointment with your favourite doctor within 1 minute
Your Health-friend. Stay informed about your health at any time, any place
Highly secure and 24x7 accessible private cloud storage for healthcare data, trends, analytics etc for you and your entire family
Platform for Healthcare Engagements & initiatives for user communities and society at large
Save even more now with Jeevom\'s exciting deals and offers
A snapshot overview of your health that improves availability and accessibility of your health essentials
Good health begins with awareness. With Jeevom\'s Health Library, stay aware, spread health
Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
You are celebrating YYYYMMDD of healthy life.
Lets update your health profile for a personalized health experience. Manage Health Profile

Jeevom Healthcare Private Limited is a young and vibrant company engaged in developing innovative software solutions for healthcare segment. We plan to revolutionize the healthcare ecosystem on global level through our \"Cloud n Crowd\" platform providing comprehensive healthcare information management, data analytics and collaboration capabilities to healthcare seeker and care providers.\n\nJeevom is based out of Delhi NCR (Noida) and is setting its footprint at a steady pace throughout India.

Jeevom is a SW platform available through a set of web and mobile applications that enables you to manage all your healthcare data and needs You can plan, track, organize and collaborate in the context of holistic healthcare (preventive, curative and wellness).

Jeevom is meant for both healthcare seekers as well as providers. Consumers across the age and gender can use it effectively for their everyday health engagement. You don;t need to be tech savvy to use this product as the services can be availed using a phone toll free phone based assistance service as well.\n\nAll kind of healthcare providers in the space of preventive healthcare, medical services as well as wellness segment can use this platform for effective practice management and collaborations with their customers.

The name Jeevom comes from the unification of two independent words \"Jeev\" + \"OM\". and it represents the unification of Jeev (the human being in this context) and OM (The supreme power). This unification is the manifestation of the comprehensive healing powers and elimination of all evils.
To be the most trusted partner for family based holistic healthcare management through innovative software solutions for consumers and providers.

• Spreading Health Awareness 
• Enabling Health Assessments 
• Encouraging Health Indulgence 
• Fostering Health Collaborations
